constÂ _permuteÂ =Â stringÂ =>Â {
Â Â constÂ resultÂ =Â []
Â Â constÂ mapÂ =Â newÂ Map()
Â Â constÂ dfsÂ =Â (path)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â ifÂ (path.lengthÂ ===Â string.length)Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â result.push(path)
Â Â Â Â Â Â return
Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â forÂ (letÂ iÂ =Â 0;Â iÂ <Â string.length;Â i++)Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (map.get(string[i]))Â continue
Â Â Â Â Â Â map.set(string[i],Â true)
Â Â Â Â Â Â pathÂ +=Â string[i]
Â Â Â Â Â Â dfs(path)
Â Â Â Â Â Â pathÂ =Â path.substring(0,Â path.lengthÂ -Â 1)
Â Â Â Â Â Â map.set(string[i],Â false)
Â Â Â Â }
Â Â }
Â Â dfs('')
Â Â returnÂ result
}

Promise.all = function (promiseList = []) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const result = []
    let count = 0
    if (promiseList.length === 0) {
      resolve(result)
      return
    }
    for (let i = 0; i < promiseList.length; i++) {
      Promise.resolve(promiseList[i]).then(res => {
        result[i] = res
        count++
        // ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥é€šè¿‡ result.length è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå› ä¸º ä¼šå­˜åœ¨ä¸‹æ ‡å¤§çš„å…ˆèµ‹å€¼
        // ä¾‹å¦‚ i = 3 ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªè¿”å›ç»“æœï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æ•°ç»„å˜ä¸º[empty,empty,empty,res]
        if (count === promiseList.length) {
          resolve(result)
        }
      }).catch(e => {
        reject(e)
      })
    }
  })
}
// è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸæˆ–å¤±è´¥çš„ç»“æœ
Promise.race = function (promiseList = []) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    if (promiseList.length === 0) {
      return resolve([])
    }
    for (let i = 0; i < promiseList.length; i++) {
      Promise.resolve(promiseList[i]).then(res => {
        resolve(res)
      }).catch(e => {
        reject(e)
      })
    }
  })
}
// æ— è®ºæˆåŠŸçº¦å¦éƒ½è¿”å›ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¼šæ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª status å­—æ®µç”¨äºæ ‡è®°æˆåŠŸ/å¤±è´¥
Promise.allSettled = function (promiseList = []) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const result = []
    let count = 0

    const addRes = (i, data) => {
      result[i] = data
      count++
      if (count === promiseList.length) {
        resolve(result)
      }
    }
    
    if (promiseList.length === 0) return resolve(result)
    for (let i = 0; i < promiseList.length; i++) {
      Promise.resolve(promiseList[i]).then(res => {
        addRes(i, { status: 'fulfilled', data: res })
      }).catch(e => {
        addRes(i, { status: 'rejected', data: e })
      })
    }
  })
}
// AggregateErrorï¼Œå½“å¤šä¸ªé”™è¯¯éœ€è¦åŒ…è£…åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ä¸­æ—¶ï¼Œè¯¥å¯¹è±¡è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯ã€‚
// å’Œ Promise.all ç›¸åï¼Œå…¨éƒ¨å¤±è´¥è¿”å›å¤±è´¥çš„ç»“æœæ•°ç»„ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæˆåŠŸåˆ™è¿”å›æˆåŠŸç»“æœ
Promise.any = function (promiseList = []) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    if (promiseList.length === 0) return resolve([])
    let count = 0
    const result = []
    for (let i = 0; i < promiseList.length; i++) {
      Promise.resolve(promiseList[i]).then(res => {
        resolve(res)
      }).catch(e => {
        count++
        result[i] = e
        if (count === promiseList.length) {
          reject(new AggregateError(result))
        }
      })
    }
  })
}

functionÂ toThousands(num)Â {

Â Â letÂ resultÂ =Â ''
Â Â whileÂ (num.lengthÂ >Â 3)Â {

    const index = Math.floor(Math.random() * i);

async function asyncPool(poolLimit, array, iteratorFn) {
  const ret = []; // å­˜å‚¨æ‰€æœ‰çš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡
  const executing = []; // å­˜å‚¨æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡
  for (const item of array) {
    // è°ƒç”¨iteratorFnå‡½æ•°åˆ›å»ºå¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡
    const p = Promise.resolve().then(() => iteratorFn(item, array));
    ret.push(p); // ä¿å­˜æ–°çš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡

    // å½“poolLimitå€¼å°äºæˆ–ç­‰äºæ€»ä»»åŠ¡ä¸ªæ•°æ—¶ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¹¶å‘æ§åˆ¶
    if (poolLimit <= array.length) {
      // å½“ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆåï¼Œä»æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„ä»»åŠ¡æ•°ç»„ä¸­ç§»é™¤å·²å®Œæˆçš„ä»»åŠ¡
      const e = p.then(() => executing.splice(executing.indexOf(e), 1));
      executing.push(e); // ä¿å­˜æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œçš„å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡
      if (executing.length >= poolLimit) {
        await Promise.race(executing); // ç­‰å¾…è¾ƒå¿«çš„ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ
      }
    }
  }
  return Promise.all(ret);
}
